mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with the correct use of a preposition: I am lucky to have my house under my School., I am lucky to have my house near my School., I am lucky to have my house above my School., I am lucky to have my house at my School.

options.a: I am lucky to have my house under my School.
options.b: I am lucky to have my house near my School.
options.c: I am lucky to have my house above my School.
options.d: I am lucky to have my house at my School.
